---
title: "residual_graphs"
output: pdf_document
date: "2026-02-10"
---


```{r, echo = FALSE}
pdf(file = 'resid_mess_up.pdf', height = 11,
    width = 8.5)
par(mfrow = c(3,2),
    cex.lab = 1.25)

x <- 1:100
y <- x + rnorm(100, sd = 5)
mod_cloud <- lm(y ~ x)
plot(mod_cloud, 1, add.smooth = FALSE)


x <- 1:100
y <- x + exp(rnorm(100, sd = 1))
mod_skew <- lm(y~x)
plot(mod_skew, 1, add.smooth = FALSE)

x <- 1:100
y <- (x + rnorm(100, sd = 1))/100
y <- exp(y)
mod_homo <- lm(y~x)
plot(mod_homo, 1, add.smooth = FALSE)


x <- 1:100
y <- (x + rnorm(100, sd = x/10))
mod_homo <- lm(y~x)
plot(mod_homo, 1)


x <- seq(0, 5*pi, .1)
y <- cos(x) + rnorm(158,sd = .25)
mod_wave <- lm(y ~ x)
plot(mod_wave, 1, add.smooth = FALSE)


x <- 1:100
z <- c(rep(4,20), rep(0, 80))
y <-  z + rnorm(100)
mod_hidden <- lm(y ~ x)
plot(mod_hidden, 1, add.smooth = FALSE)



x <- 1:100
y <- x + c(rnorm(75, sd = 1),
           rnorm(25, sd = 3))
mod_loud <- lm(y ~ x)
plot(mod_loud, 1, add.smooth = FALSE)



x <- seq(0, 1, .01)
y <- rbinom(101, 1, prob = x)
mod_bern <- lm(y ~ x)
plot(mod_bern, 1, add.smooth = FALSE)


x <- seq(0, 1, .01)
y <- rbinom(101, 10, prob = x)
mod_binom <- lm(y ~ x)
plot(mod_binom, 1, add.smooth = FALSE)

dev.off()
```
